title: In-House Features
content: Blockchain alone is not enough. Several dApps are underway and will take advantage of Kaichain's mechanics.

title: Flawless Transaction
content: Transactions will be smooth and is readily available ANYTIME and ANYWHERE at maximum speed and efficiency.

title: Unmatched Speed
content: With blocks compressed size, fast validations and high speed block times, every transaction will just blast off.
